paper_abstract: Recently, several works have approached the HIV-1 protease specificity problem by applying techniques from machine learning. In this work, an encoding scheme based on the BLOSUM50 matrix is investigated. We show that combining a linear discriminant classifier and radial basis function support vector machine we obtain performance higher than previously published in the literature. (c) 2005 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A reliable method for HIV-1 protease cleavage site prediction
